wiki_section_title: Politics and public service -- International

wiki_section_text: 

intro: As a celebration of the new MIT building dedicated to nanotechnology laboratories in 2018, a special silicon wafer was designed and fabricated with an image of the Great Dome. This One.MIT image is composed of more than 270,000 individual names, comprising all the students, faculty, and staff at MIT during the years 1861-2018. A special website was set up to document the creation of a large wall display in the building, and to facilitate the location of individual names in the image.
